website_summaries.verdict: This lint roller set offers a good variety of rollers for all your pet hair removal needs.
pros: Includes a full-size lint roller with 2 refills and a mini lint roller that is ideal for travel or sticking in your purse or car
Sheets are very sticky and pick up pet hair easily
Company also offers good customer service in the case of any issues
cons: Some buyers had issues with the handle breaking

customer_reviews.title: Two - Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The rollers are good and easy to peel, but the handle broke the first time I used it. After initially giving the product only two stars, I revised my review to 4 stars because their customer service is really good. Upon reading that the handle broke, they sent me a complete new set of rollers and handle. Now THAT is customer service! So far the new roller handle works.
customer_reviews.author: JUL

customer_reviews.title: Superior performance over evercare and Scotch Bright
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of lint rollers due to the newest member of our family, a constantly shedding loveable rescue dog. I used the Pet Lovers lint roller for the first time this morning and I have to say, it's a winner over Evercare as well as Scotch Bright. PetLovers sheets are extra sticky and sheets do not fight you when rolling back and forth. No unrolling if direction is reversed and what I personally appreciate is the ease of removing sheets. I actually used half the number of sheets compared to the other above mentioned product. Klynn
customer_reviews.author: klynn

customer_reviews.title: Better than scotch brite, actually is EXTRA STICKY 11/10
customer_reviews.text: Anyone with a pet knows how the hair gets everywhere! My dog sheds a lot, and I am always rushing last minute before work to get lint and pet hair off of my clothes. I've tried the name brands, some of the others, and even when compared to Scotch Brite, this roller truly was extra sticky. I didn't have to continuously re-roll over areas, this roller is definitely the best I've tried. Especially when you're using a lint roller on a nice suit, you don't want it to tug on the cloth fibers. No issues there, this is a definitely a household must.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superior product!
customer_reviews.text: They are indeed extra sticky! One pass picked up all the cat hair (in that strip's reach) on a bedspread that attracts it like a magnet. We have a long-haired cat that sheds constantly, and this works better than the ordinary lint rollers for getting every hair.
customer_reviews.author: Nefertari's Companions

customer_reviews.title: Really is better than the "normal" rollers
customer_reviews.text: Really is better than the "normal" rollers. One roll picks up all or nearly all the cat hair! Just wish each roll had more sheets. With 5 cats, I'm going to go through these fast.
customer_reviews.author: Notacritic

customer_reviews.title: Great for crafting, too
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. Although it’s great for getting rid of the fur that my kitty so thoughtfully leaves all around the house, I actually bought it for use in card making. After running a piece of paper through a die-cutting machine, there can be lots of tiny pieces of the die cut pattern that need to be removed somehow - using a poky tool is slow and laborious. Just saw a YouTube demonstrator roll a lint remover across the back of the cut paper, and voilà! All the excess pieces were caught in the stickiness and removed. Also good for picking any loose pieces on your work surface.
customer_reviews.author: Rowantree

customer_reviews.title: Very sticky. Good for cat hair on upholstery, bedding, clothes etc.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It works well to get the accumulated cat hair off of upholstery. It very very sticky. The packaging is wrapped with a ladle and then another thin piece of wrapping. Keep this to wrap over the next sticky sheet so it stick to anything before the next use. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Angella

customer_reviews.title: Improvement in " tear" ability!
customer_reviews.text: Hooray! So much easier to pull off the roll! Finally an innovation that really is an improvement! Did you mention that or did I just look for the ones I usually buy? Most " improvements " never are! ...seems they are nothing but a bunch of verbiage- new fragrance etc. Good for you all in that for me this new way to tear from the roller is great for my old fingers and certainly for less frustration!
customer_reviews.author: Jean A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Really Sticky Lint Roller Sheets, Picks Up a LOT of Debris
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this is the first lint roller I've had that is set up more like a biscuit package. You peel the sheets off by finding the corner and it rolls off diagonally. A very short learning curve there. Also, I learned that I can't replace the cover on an unused sheet---they're that sticky! I have to use the sheet even just a little in order for the cover to work with the roller. I use a lot more sheets because this lint roller REALLY picks up the goods! I'm very happy with this lint roller and the price and will be re-ordering when I need more.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D

customer_reviews.title: The `BEST`  .. and I mean one - 'sticky' roller - that we have EVER found / Pets and clothing!
customer_reviews.text: Certainly found PetLovers' GREAT EXTRA 'sticky' lint rollers the very best that we have ever bought, both [needed] reasons for pet hair and clothing lint... using only one swipe ...no repeating back *and* forth trying to CATCH those pick ups of tiny fur baby hairs or any new found cumulation that were discovered from weeks of storage /without a protection cover. Anything being of black material looks likes new, again. The price was ~beyond ~ reasonable, along with the 2 extra replacements. What a surprise to have an extra hand held smaller version for the car, also. One fine product! Thank you Pet Lovers. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only redeeming factor is the price is cheaper than more known brands.
customer_reviews.text: Just finished using up my last roll and can see these are by far the worst lint rollers ive used. The rollers are trash, especially the little one. They easily roll the tubes out andI ended having to flange the ends a bit and that helped it enough. The sticky papers would often stick to each other because they are thin and every now and then it ripped off another layer. And lastly, I didn't find these too sticky, basically at or below stickiness of name brands. Would not buy again/recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham R.

customer_reviews.title: Brings new meaning to "stick it to 'em".
customer_reviews.text: When you have a long haired cat that hair builds up and floats around. She tends to like to sit in all the places I like to sit and leaves bushels of hair to stick on my clothes. Normal rollers take repeated uses, and several sheets of the sticky stuff to get the job done. Your product is one and done. Well worth the money to get something that actually works. Hair today gone tomorrow. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Juergens

customer_reviews.title: Better than any other
customer_reviews.text: Controlling flying fur seemed challenging with a short haired kitty, then I “inherited” a long haired Persian. Oh my. Despite having a top of the line brush & using it daily, fur was everywhere. Especially on my dark scrubs required for work. This picks up fur extremely well. I can see exactly where the fur is gone & where the fur remains. Only minus is the layers peel off on the diagonal rather than horizontal. Had to adjust to this difference, but not enough of a negative to give less than 5 stars. Get it. You will love it.
customer_reviews.author: martha rogers

customer_reviews.title: The price was great for four
customer_reviews.text: These have worked well for us over the last couple of months. The only complaint I have is that they lose their stick fast so it takes me two or three sheets to do one sweater or pair of pants. This may be our problem though since we have a malamute mix dog that sheds a lot. The price was great for four, so I can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Best tear off sheets I have dealt with
customer_reviews.text: These rollers are just as sticky as any I have had, with the bonus of being very easy to tear off each sheet. They tear off at an angle and are staggered on the roll, so it's not possible to grab more than one sheet. Other rolls seem to be cut after being put on the tube so the cut lines up for all of them and I was constantly trying to only take off one at a time. These also don't ever seem to tear while being pulled off, as the paper is pretty strong and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ping2k

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get to next strip
customer_reviews.text: ** updates. Bought another set for the trailer. Great product. Arrived on time. And just as advertised gets the hair. Very sticky. Love the little purse size one. I have used it on my bed comforter and worked great. The strips are on a angle so easy to get to a fresh one. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Super sticky!
customer_reviews.text: With 2 dogs and a cat I am constantly covered in pet hair. This product works great! Super sticky. Easy peal design to get to the next sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Cora Grandfield

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommend
customer_reviews.text: These rollers are EXCELLENT. When I forget/overlook vacuuming my dinette chairs and guests are due to arrive any minute (especially a guest who is allergic to cat fur) I use one of the rollers on each chair and the hair is removed, no one sneezes when we sit around the table!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing I'm a hair stylist and use them on every customer easy to tear off real great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: christie lynn denison

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE FUR TRAUMA!
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap this stuff works like magic! I have a husky and dealing with fur issues is my life but this tool makes it easy for me to go out without looking like I own one. I even use it directly on the dog after grooming to pick up loose hairs. Thank you thank you thank you for this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Fairly Well
customer_reviews.text: The price-point is great, and I like that the set I purchased came with one assembled roller, plus an additional three roll replacements and an extra handle. My only complaint is that, while the roller is indeed very sticky, it quickly fills up with hair. Each layer of roll can be used about 5 rolls before filling with hair. Perhaps the animal breed/ thickness of the hair makes a difference and that's what I'm noticing? Works well enough for the price, though.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey G.

customer_reviews.title: Go to the dollar store and get their Glade roller for $1 and save yourself the disappointment. They are no more sticky than any other ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't ignore this honest review. The rolls spin off the roller after the second use. AWFUL!!! Go to the dollar store and get their Glade roller for $1 and save yourself the disappointment. They are no more sticky than any other lint roller I have tried. Very unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Stickiest  ever!
customer_reviews.text: While these are definitely the most sticky I have ever used, the roll loves to detach from the handle as your rolling. It’s a pain to constantly stop to put it back on. Even still, they are sticky enough to be totally worth the hassle
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: These rollers do a good job and I like the way the used ones peel off the roll. The brand I have used before feels stickier to the touch but these seem to do just as good a job picking up hair and lint. I really like that there are more sheets per roll and the travel size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Nit very sticky. Very difficult to remove used sheets and expose next. Need to scrape edge to enable peeling used sheet - sometimes comes off in multiple pieces. Too expensive to throw away. Too cheap to return. Not happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE C STEINBACH

customer_reviews.title: Can only roll 1 way
customer_reviews.text: I normally would purchase scotch brite lint roller but they stopped selling them at my Costco. This brand is ok, it removes all my animal fur off my clothes in 1 sheet which is better then some brands I've used where I need 2 sheets or more. It bothers me that I can really only roll it in 1 direction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Best lint roller I have ever used!!! Got all of my dog's blonde hair off of my black pants with one sheet!!! I have used other lint rollers and have had to use 4 or 5 sheets to get all of the pet hair off! Love these lint rollers!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bluirisheyes34

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and easy To Use!
customer_reviews.text: The tape is very sticky and comes apart with ease without wrecking the shape of the rest of the tape. I have severe arthritis so easy is appreciated! Love the mini! Just put it into the guest room where our hairy beast loves to visit visitors. Doesn’t bother the “other”guest room. Best wishes for your business’ success.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Nicholaou

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This product is a piece of trash really cheap plastic it broke the first time I used it I won’t recommend it don’t buy it
customer_reviews.author: Micho Rizo

customer_reviews.title: This product works
customer_reviews.text: I have a calico cat that sheds constantly. I have tried so many different lint rollers like 3M without much success. They never pick up all the hair no matter how many passes you make. I was pleasantly surprised by these. They pick up everything! Most times on the first pass. Thank you for making a product that actually works! I will definitely be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tireniel

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've bought other lint rollers that have perforated sheets, and it's hard to find the end when it's time to remove the used sheet. These are cut on an angle, are much thinner and are just a pleasure to use. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet hair!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I mainly use them to remove hair from our couches (hair is everywhere with three dogs and a cat). These are the best I have found and I have tried a lot!!
customer_reviews.author: JNFarros

customer_reviews.title: Like every other lint roller
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing special about these lint rollers. The handle is nice and sturdy so it doesn't feel like it will break when I am using it to get the dog hair off my couch. Other than that, they work like every other one. It takes several sheets to get the dog hair off my clothes and sometimes the roll starts to slide off the handle.
customer_reviews.author: alryan

customer_reviews.title: Incredible clean-up
customer_reviews.text: Would give ten stars if I could. Cleaned the sofa and one chair with five sheets. Miraculous job. My dog is super hairy. This sticky roller is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lois Canter

customer_reviews.title: The sheets are better for me
customer_reviews.text: This item is not what I meant to order. I wanted to order Evercare pet hair extra sticky lint roller with 2 refills 180 total sheets. Yours is a peel over sheets and that is hard for me to find where to peel it off? That is the only negative I have for this product. The sheets are better for me
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These work better than any other lint roller I have tried. I have a Boxer and an Akita/Husky. There is hair everywhere. Seriously, it's on my screen as I am typing this. These are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Work great for hair removal
customer_reviews.text: These work great for removing hair/lint. My only problem is I wish they sold replacement rolls without the handle. Who needs multiple handles sitting around, or going in the trash/recycle.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Grzeskowiak

customer_reviews.title: A must for multiple cat households
customer_reviews.text: Somehow I ended up with five cats in my house and family and friends who tend to wear black clothing. After complaints about not wanting to sit on my couches, I got these sticky lint rollers. They work great and having two back up rolls means I won't need a re-order for at least a year. I've tried the reusable, washable kind and they really don't work that well. These sticky paper ones are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jane VN

customer_reviews.title: MUCH better than the "standard" lint rollers I have purchased in ...
customer_reviews.text: MUCH better than the "standard" lint rollers I have purchased in the past. No longer feel the need to shoo the cats away from me in the morning when I'm wearing dark colored pants.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Miller

customer_reviews.title: Yes, they are sticky, but...
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as sticky as I thought, but work just fine. There needs to be a cover of some sort because they will stick to anything they touch and you have to tear off other paper, plastic bags, etc. Watch where you store them!
customer_reviews.author: CA Lady

customer_reviews.title: Greal deal. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging. Would buy from them again. I love the various sizes. One I can keep at home, one in my purse, and one in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Love the two different sizes
customer_reviews.text: Love the two different sizes. One for inside the house and one for the car. It would be even better if it came with an additional “small” roll for the car to refill. They work great, amazing value here. You know your pet will shed so why aren’t you buying lint rolls in bulk? Stop wasting money on onesie twosies and spring for this multi pack!
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Don’t care for the way sheets are rolled at an angle. Thought I was ordering Evercare packaging is the same color
customer_reviews.author: LINDA KRAMER

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Unroll
customer_reviews.text: Although this product works reasonably well in removing pet hair and lint, it requires frequent unrolling of the tape, and unrolling of the tape is quite difficult and requires use of a scissor. The result is significant product wastage and an inordinate expenditure of time. Other products on the market are far more user-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Thar the product works great and much better than those store bought products.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fact that the product actually worked! I have a long haired cat and it was impossible to remove her hair from my sunbrella fabric cushions. Your product did the job, thank you. The only negative I found was not having a cover for the balance of the roll, however that did not affect the performance. Note: I tried to save the original wrap but it kept tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and effective
customer_reviews.text: Effectively removes fur, even my yellow lab's, which tends to embed itself into fabrics. The size of the rollers fits nicely into a bag, and I especially appreciate the travel size rollers. I will definitely reorder!
customer_reviews.author: mccol2

customer_reviews.title: Very Sticky but thin.
customer_reviews.text: Sticky yes but I find the pulling method to be frustrating. The sticker is very thin and tears easily. I find the design of how it's rolled leaves you accidentally tearing off more than one sheet at a time. However it works well and is probably stickier than most.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Howard

customer_reviews.title: Best Rollers Available
customer_reviews.text: This actually work! They are super sticky, like the ad says. They are also very easy to peel. I super appreciate how easy they are to use. I will buy these everytime I need a refill.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Vikkers

customer_reviews.title: Help maintain your clothing!
customer_reviews.text: Getting these amazing lint rollers helped me keep my favorite jacket! It really cleans my clothes when needed. Especially on some materials that always get dirt. I highly recommend this package. The little one is great for small spots on your clothing. So yes, you’ll need that too.
customer_reviews.author: Maher Sinjary

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy these.The worst Ive ever had.Dollar store is better than theses
customer_reviews.text: Awlful do not waste your money.Can' get the crappy sheets apart no matter I do!!! Had to cut them apart with a razor blade because they wont rip apart at the preparations.Junk
customer_reviews.author: Eileen R.

customer_reviews.title: extra sticky
customer_reviews.text: I love these and have reordered several times. I have 2 cats and use them on everything. They don't leave a residue on your clothes like some products. You do need fingernails to remove a used sheet; they are cut on an angle and once you get it started, it comes off easily. I find I don't use as many sheets as I did with other products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried all different brands of lint rollers and these are my favorite. They peel diagonally which is so much easier to peel than than normal straight cut rollers and they are super sticky. I have 3 cats and 1 dog (and three daughters with lots of hair lol) so we have hair everywhere. I use these rollers for my laundry and they work really well.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Works for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: Good and sticky for getting pet hair off my couch. I have to use quite a few peel of pieces but it does the job when the vaccuum cant!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's basically like other rollers, but I did feel like this picked up a bit more then the standard one does. Will purchase more of these again.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: One of the better
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the better I have used. Removes my rag doll hair which is a challenge for many.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Having 3 cats and a dog I am always needing to 'dehair' myself :) - this tape is the best!!! Only recommendation I would have is that it would be nice if there was a sleeve to store it in when not in use. Highly recommend for all pet owners!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Sager

customer_reviews.title: Not What They are Cracked up to be
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are difficult to remove and are not that sticky. There is also no cover for these lint rollers when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Eden

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My shiba inu is in the midst of shedding season and needless to say I was desperate for a reliable lint roller that removed pet hair. I used this on my couch, office chair, car seats, and everything else imaginable and the pet hair rolled right off. Definitely recommend this product for anybody whose furry friend leaves more fur around the house than on their body!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The rollers are really sticky and get the pet hair efficiently. Great customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Neckels

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: It works alright, hard to remove a layer, but picks up a lot of cat hair easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Kellman

customer_reviews.title: Cleans the mess!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It works super great! Gets all of the hair and lint and general debris off of your clothes super easy! And I love carrying around the smaller one in my purse! It’s come in clutch on more than a few occasions :)
customer_reviews.author: Becca Feightner

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair removers
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what we are looking for. We have two Shelties and several cats. The shedding of hair among these furry kids is never ending and these sticky rollers are life savers. Always have one in the car so we can get hair off before going in anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and spend a little more for higher quality. These are awful. I use a ton for pet hair and these could not hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: VERY adhesive — BUT I wish the sheets were a sold “ square” and not rectangular.
customer_reviews.author: tina diffee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to peel
customer_reviews.text: These are not as sticky as other kinds I have had before. I have to use more sheets to get job done.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Enneking

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t believe a roller could really be this good and I was at my wits end with trying to get cat fur off our clothes, these rollers are absolutely amazing.. I can wear black again!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Extra Sticky
customer_reviews.text: These work really well. I have two dogs that shed like crazy and it's a battle but these are the best for the fur problem that I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Handle breaks making the product useless
customer_reviews.text: The handle broke almost immediately with normal use - basically not usable now as the roll doesn’t fit into other handles I have. The stickiness was good.
customer_reviews.author: Mappy

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed
customer_reviews.text: I realize that this is just a lint roller, but I appreciate the fact that the seam on each sheet is staggered from the one that is under it. This keeps the seams from splitting like you see in other products, and it keeps you from pulling off more than one sheet at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I use lint rollers everyday for my work uniforms and these rollers are horrible. The removable sticky roller really is removable. I can’t even use one sticky sheet without the roller coming off the handle. And quite often he handle bends so the roller is not even able to roll. Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing cat hair
customer_reviews.text: Great product to remove long cat hair. I really liked the package it came in. There’s multiple components to the lint roller set. It’s great. There’s a travel size one and a full one.
customer_reviews.author: AZPrimeGirl

customer_reviews.title: Cleans up great
customer_reviews.text: It removed pet hair, lint etc. very good. However, when it states extra sticky, yes, it is. Definitely need some muscle power to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great deal! The lint rollers are sticky and easy to tear off. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because the mini roller that comes with it is very hard to use (the sheets are so hard to tear off). I wish they would just put extra sheets in the big lint rollers and do away with the mini rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stickier than chameleon spit
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great lint rollers. Easily picks up all the hair and lint from my car seats, couches, and work clothes. I use the small roller all the time, since it is the perfect size to fit tucked away in the glove box of my car.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Marquez

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this product again
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. It does not roll easily and gets stuck most of the time. Also, the sticky paper is impossible to tear off. I would not buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like the product
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it is more sticky than some I have had in the past. I also like how easy it is to tear off a used sheet. The way they are torn at an angle is a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Sooz

customer_reviews.title: Sticky Stuff
customer_reviews.text: So far I like these rollers. I have a dog that has short hair, but really sheds. The stickiness of the roller pulls the hair right off our clothes and couch. I would recommend these rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Silverfox

customer_reviews.title: Best pet hair remover
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hair and lint remover. It's really sticky. I have 4 cats so I have to use these constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Love that it comes with mini roller I keep in car too. Got to have lent rollers! Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Linder

customer_reviews.title: Great sticky lint rollers
customer_reviews.text: Great sticky lint rollers. I have two dogs and use them all the time. This one really picks up everything. I also loved the way to tear off the layers, no more waste anymore! I will buy it again next time.
customer_reviews.author: Maru

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I need
customer_reviews.text: Great! I love how it’s a spiral removal of the old paper instead of one straight line now. Makes removal super smooth. Picks up hair extremely well! I have 3 dogs that shed enough to cover my floors daily.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Removes most hair quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Work great especially when fur brushes won't when staticky. I have 2 Goldens and they shed 24/7 and these work great to remove most hair quickly. Had used tape, but such a hassle. Roller works quick and easy to peel to next sheet.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: The handle and will roll comes apart with every roll 😒
customer_reviews.text: The sticky tape works well and is easy to remove after use. But the handle keeps coming apart from the role of sticky paper. Not good! I ended up having to buy a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These lint rollers work very well. Exactly what I was looking for to remove massive amounts of stubborn dog hair from my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I mean it does the job but the miniature one wasn't included as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Xoxojoy01

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you have pets who shed like crazy
customer_reviews.text: Extra sticky indeed. Perfect if you have pets who shed like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Scotch Brite rollers are the only ones I will use.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to remove sheets and to roll. Handle flimsy. Scotch Brite ones are better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Potvien

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Includes different sizes and refills. Seems like it will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat hair is easily picked up
customer_reviews.text: These rollers are more sticky than the ones you purchase in stores. Cat hair is easily picked up. It is also easier to take off the used strips. I would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I have a German Shepherd and she sheds like crazy against my black uniform pants. I mistakenly purchased the Pet Lovers brand however, I am pleased with the product. I use it on clothes and furniture, the sheets are sticky and peeling to reveal a clean sheet is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Missc1976

customer_reviews.title: Works tho
customer_reviews.text: The layers are so challenging to take off and just rip into a mess like torliet rolls that have gone awry
customer_reviews.author: The Dyrensborgs ✨

customer_reviews.title: Gets even the short, fine hairs.
customer_reviews.text: Extra sticky for sure. This roller hot the short, fine hairs that my cat leaves on my slacks. No other roller has. I like the diamond shaped sheets for easy removal.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't pick up much hair, same as other cheaper & more expensive products.
customer_reviews.author: SLK

customer_reviews.title: Puurfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I have cats and this product has done the best job of removing all the hair! I'm a very happy customer.😻
customer_reviews.author: connie wiley

customer_reviews.title: Good product, responsive company
customer_reviews.text: I really like this roller--very sticky, really gets everything. I initially received an incomplete set of rollers, but the company responded promptly and resolved the issue. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: everyblueline

customer_reviews.title: Work well on pet hair.
customer_reviews.text: The brush is sticky enough. It works well on lint and dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: These are the best ever. With a black lab and a cat,these pick up a tremendous amount of fur.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These do the job better than any other roller we have tried in recent years
customer_reviews.author: Moiraine43

customer_reviews.title: ONE SHEET CLEANED TWO PANTS
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a roller lint remover. I have no pets, but my grand-dog does visit. I have corduroy pants that come out of the dryer covered in lint. My new large roller cleaned off all the lint on two pants with one sheet. I am very satisfied with that though have no experience as a comparison.
customer_reviews.author: CDW-H

customer_reviews.title: The best lint roller for pet hair on furniture
customer_reviews.text: I have three big dogs that really enjoy our sofa. I have been through many, many brands of lint rollers and this one is by far the best designed. This is the only brand I will purchase from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rosenthal

product_meta.title: PetLovers Extra Sticky Lint Rollers, 270 Sheets for Pet Hair Removal, Dog and Cat Lint Remover
